
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pri(x) printf("%d",x)
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pll(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define sstr(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pstr(s) printf("%s",s)
#define nl printf("\n")
#define ll long long int

int x[26][26]={-1};

int solve(int a[], int m, int cur, int n) {
    if(m==0) {
	return 1;
    }
    if(cur>=n) {
	return 0;
    }
    if(x[m][cur] != -1) {
	return x[m][cur];
    }
    int ans = 0;
    for(int i=0;i<=a[cur] && i<=m;++i) {
	ans += solve(a,m-i,cur+1,n);
    }
    x[m][cur]=ans;
    return ans;
}

int main()
{
    memset(x,-1,sizeof(x));
    int n,m;
    si(n); si(m);
    int a[n];
    for(int i=0;i<n;++i) {
	si(a[i]);
    }
    int ans = solve(a,m,0,n);
    pri(ans); nl;
    return 0;
}
